reviewText: I was in this movie as an extra (young woman with long blonde hair in the airport at the end), so when I found this movie online I was ecstatic! It is a well acted touching and bittersweet love affair.
I would highly recommend this seller. The video arrived in the condition it was described and it arrived on time. I am very pleased.
Saw this movie on TV many decades ago and just fell in love with it.  Have been searching for it ever since.  Thank you!
A sensitive touching love story, a Passionate love affair that nobody wins. I just love the movie, I watch it over and over again,one to buy if you like love stories!
